content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: DOMAIN
      operator: not_matches_regex
      value: ^[A-Z0-9_]*$
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.33
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when the value of DOMAIN contains non-uppercase characters
Outcome:
  Message: DOMAIN value must be uppercase
  Output Variables:
    - DOMAIN
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '33'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Two character domain identifier is in uppercase.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when the value of DOMAIN contains non-uppercase characters

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Two character domain identifier is in uppercase.
